Advanced Settings

The Advanced Settings window contains parameters that should only be changed by someone with a thorough knowledge of the system. The window provides access to hundreds of settings, the majority of which never require changes. This help describes the settings are most commonly used. For help configuring other parameters, please contact your technical support representative.

Warning: Although you are able to change text in the application interface using Advanced Settings, Picis recommends against doing so. Customized text is not preserved during product upgrades. In addition it should be remembered that documentation refers to standard menu, command and control names; changes may be confusing to users and complicate product support.

Documenting and viewing data on flowsheets

l Early documentation limit

l Order extension period

l Extend order time limit

l Documentation limit for finished orders

l Time limit for documenting tasks

l Default starting time for orders added during a session

l Rounded starting time for orders

l Session start time as the default starting time for orders

l Default time for documenting a task

l Memo for manual extensions of continuous V fluid orders

l Rights needed to discontinue orders

l IV base solution volumes

l Required ID number for blood bags

l Decimal places in doses and volumes

l Number of digits for rounding flowsheet values

l Doses outside reference range

Message and prompts to users

l Prompt users for confirmation

l Acknowledge completion of tasks

l Show or hide the daylight savings time (DST) message

l Assessments box height

l Assessments multi-selection symbol

l Barometric pressure for APACHE II

l Equipment checklists on flowsheets
